name: Escape the Castle (kodoktroll)
description:
Sven is a thief in the medieval ages. He had stolen many things successfully. But unfortunately his acts got caught when he was trying to steal something from the castle. He has to escape from the castle before the guards surround all the exits. Luckily, he has a mage friend called Aleena who is a master of portals. But because there were so many guards, she panicked and put all of the portals randomly without knowing where it leads to. You need to help Sven find the right portal that leads him out of the castle before the guards find that portal exit and close it.

features: 

- Some portals that can teleport Sven to another portal exit. 

- Discord presence

- Challenging obstacles

Gameplay & Control : 

- Arrow right and left = right and left

- Space = Jump 

Game 's source gitlab : https://gitlab.com/kodoktroll/gamejam-2019

Muhammad Volyando Belvadra
